sentences.en: ...armed incursions into border areas by rebel forces.
A fourth supporter was banned for a pitch incursion.
sentences.cn: 此外,还有1名球迷在赛后试图冲进场内袭击他人.

sentences.en: Last February Turkish soldiers entered Iraq in a eight - day long incursion.
sentences.cn: 土耳其军队今年2月进入伊拉克,实施了一次为期8天的进攻行动.

sentences.en: Save for this annual incursion, they left literature alone.
sentences.cn: 除了这一年一度的例外, 他们与文学无缘.

sentences.en: They were outraged by our incursion into Cambodia.
sentences.cn: 他们对我们入侵柬埔寨感到愤慨.

sentences.en: Unlawful incursion has been threatening the safety of computer network system.
sentences.cn: 摘要非法入侵一直威胁着计算机网络系统的安全.

sentences.en: We know of your incursion into our territory.
sentences.cn: 我们知道你们袭击了我们的领土.

trans.tran_cn: 侵犯，侵入，（河水等）流入，袭击
trans.tran_en: a sudden attack into an area that belongs to other people
